report.name: stockImmo_new

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT tmp.projet, tmp.statut, to_char(tmp.datestatut,'DD/MM/YYYY'), tmp.annee,replace(round(SUM (tmp.euro),2),'.',',') euro FROM ( /* IMMO année 2004 à N-1 */ SELECT pi.icpi projet, pi.statut statut, pi.datstatut datestatut, a.annee annee, b.jh jh, b.euro euro FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY') annee FROM histo_stock_immo_corrige h GROUP BY TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY')) a CROSS JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT h.icpi, pi.statut, pi.datstatut FROM histo_stock_immo_corrige h, proj_info pi, ligne_bip bip WHERE h.icpi = pi.icpi AND h.pid = bip.pid AND (INSTR(:P_APP,bip.airt)>0 OR INSTR(:P_PROJET,pi.icpi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_DOS_PROJ,pi.icodproj)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_FI,h.cafi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_DA,to_char(h.cada,'FM00000'))>0)) pi , (SELECT icpi, TO_CHAR (cdeb, 'YYYY') annee, SUM (consojh) jh, SUM (coutft * consojh) euro FROM histo_stock_immo_corrige GROUP BY icpi, TO_CHAR (cdeb, 'YYYY')) b WHERE a.annee = b.annee AND b.icpi = pi.icpi UNION /*IMMO à 0 de 2004 à N pour compléter les années manquante*/ SELECT pi.icpi projet, pi.statut statut, pi.datstatut datestatut, a.annee annee, 0 jh, 0 euro FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY') annee FROM histo_stock_immo_corrige h GROUP BY TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY') UNION SELECT TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY') annee FROM stock_immo h GROUP BY TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY')) a CROSS JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT h.icpi, pi.statut, pi.datstatut FROM histo_stock_immo_corrige h, proj_info pi, ligne_bip bip WHERE h.icpi = pi.icpi AND h.pid = bip.pid AND (INSTR(:P_APP,bip.airt)>0 OR INSTR(:P_PROJET,pi.icpi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_DOS_PROJ,pi.icodproj)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_FI,h.cafi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_DA,to_char(h.cada,'FM00000'))>0) UNION SELECT DISTINCT s.icpi, pi.statut, pi.datstatut FROM stock_immo s, proj_info pi, ligne_bip bip WHERE s.icpi = pi.icpi AND s.pid = bip.pid AND (INSTR(:P_APP,bip.airt)>0 OR INSTR(:P_PROJET,pi.icpi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_DOS_PROJ,pi.icodproj)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_FI,s.cafi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_DA,to_char(s.cada,'FM00000'))>0) ORDER BY icpi) pi UNION /* IMMO année N */ SELECT pi.icpi projet, pi.statut statut, pi.datstatut datestatut, a.annee annee, b.jh jh, b.euro euro FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY') annee FROM stock_immo h GROUP BY TO_CHAR (h.cdeb, 'YYYY')) a CROSS JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT s.icpi, pi.statut, pi.datstatut FROM stock_immo s, proj_info pi, ligne_bip bip WHERE s.icpi = pi.icpi AND s.pid = bip.pid AND (INSTR(:P_APP,bip.airt)>0 OR INSTR(:P_PROJET,pi.icpi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_DOS_PROJ,pi.icodproj)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_FI,s.cafi)>0 OR INSTR(:P_CA_DA,to_char(s.cada,'FM00000'))>0)) pi , (SELECT icpi, TO_CHAR (cdeb, 'YYYY') annee, SUM (consojh) jh, SUM (coutft * consojh) euro FROM stock_immo GROUP BY icpi, TO_CHAR (cdeb, 'YYYY')) b WHERE a.annee = b.annee AND b.icpi = pi.icpi) tmp GROUP BY tmp.projet, tmp.annee, tmp.statut, tmp.datestatut

dataItem.name: TO_CHAR_TMP_DATESTATUT_DD_MM_Y
dataItem.defaultLabel: To Char Tmp Datestatut Dd Mm Y

function.name: afterpform

report.webSource:

<html>
<head> <meta name="GENERATOR" content="Oracle 9i Reports Developer"/> <title> Your Title </title>
<rw:style id="yourStyle"> <!-- Report Wizard inserts style link clause here --> </rw:style>
</head>
<body>

</body> </html>
